/QuickLinks.aspx

1. The City of Port Arthur website is operated and funded by the City. The website will post information for and about City services, programs and events. Organizations may submit announcements for publication on the City website if the organization and/or the event is funded by the City, takes place at a City facility, or sponsored by the City. All submissions must be sent to the City's Public Information Office for consideration. All content of the website is subject to review by the City Manager and the City Attorney. Acceptance of a submitted item does not guarantee its inclusion on the City website.

   [Request for Publication](https://www.portarthurtx.gov/FormCenter/Civic-Center-6/Request-for-Publication-on-City-Website-83)
